title: Entering The Cave (Part 2)
body:
Entering The Cave (Part 2)

Thinking about the strange aura that the cave was releasing, Evan decided to complete the trial that he received.

He stopped in front of the stone platform and tried to pick up a purple-coloured herb from the plate.

Unlike last time, no barrier appeared around the herb when he tried to pick it and he easily picked up the herb.

After picking up the herb, Evan tried to look for its information through the status window, but just as he expected, for some reason, he couldn't see the herb's information.

He looked at the formation that was glowing beneath his feet and finally understood the purpose of the formation.

"And here I thought it was some kind of attack formation or something..." Evan muttered in a low voice and used Shadow Senses.
